name: @waylay/motionDetector
description:
This sensor can be used in case you want either to push the motionDetector state using a Broker - via getStreamData call, or if the state of the motionDetector comes from another node, via getRawData. The sensor will return back if the motionDetector is on or off. If none of these is found it will throw the exception. Input argument (item) can be:
  • string like on/off
  • rawData that holds on/off string
  • streamData parameter that holds on/off string
Example: use as the item "motionDetector" and then push this data: { "motionDetector" : "on" }
